Hawthorne.City Honors High School:
City Honors High School (CHHS) also known as City Honors Preparatory, is a public high school in the Inglewood Unified School District (IUSD), serving grades 9–12.
City Honors High School is a school in the on the corner of 120 W Regent Street and Queen Street in Downtown Inglewood.
Being that City Honors is a college preparatory charter school, City Honors is designed to allow their students to graduate from high school with an AA along with their high school diploma.
